Html: In C# projects I can see the option to add a TypeScript file in Add New Item and on the projects right click menu. However, this is not the case with VB projects. Are there suppose to be TypeScript templates for VB also?
To my understanding, in theory it should work similarly. Copying this over to the issue tracker.
